Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video does not show a drunk police officer on the streets after India relaxed rules on liquor sales during the COVID-19 lockdown. The video actually shows an intoxicated police officer in Faizabad in June 2017.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading video and does not provide accurate information about the incident.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is related to the relaxation of liquor sales rules during the COVID-19 lockdown in India, which is not true.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the video is from a different time and location (Faizabad in June 2017) and is not related to the COVID-19 lockdown or the relaxation of liquor sales rules.
